import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Header.css'; import logo2 from '../../asserts/log.png'; // Ensure the path is correct import LogoutButton from '../Logout/Logout'; // Adjust path as needed const Header = () => { const [isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { // Check if user is logged in (adjust as needed) const token = localStorage.getItem('authToken'); setIsLoggedIn(!!token); }, []); return (
